mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title AS name, 'TODO' AS TYPE, t.is_completed FROM todos t WHERE t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') UNION SELECT p.id, p.name AS name, 'PROJECT' AS TYPE, NULL AS is_completed FROM projects p LEFT JOIN collaborators c ON c.project_id = p.id WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND (p.owner_id = #{userId} OR (c.collaborator_id = #{userId} AND c.confirm_type = 'TRUE'))
